```{r setup}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r read-tract-ks}
path_name <- "../data"
file_name <- "tl_2021_20_tract.shp"
path_name                              %>%
  paste(file_name, sep="/")            %>%
  st_read(stringsAsFactors=FALSE)      -> all_tract_ks
head(all_tract_ks)
all_tract_ks                           %>%
     ggplot()                              +
      geom_sf(aes())                    +
      ggtitle("ks-tract")
```


```{r read-tract-mo}
path_name <- "../data"
```
